title: Borneck
wikitext:
[[File:Borneck.jpg|thumb|right|Borneck]] '''Species:''' Borneck
'''Home Planet:''' [[Vellity]]

'''Borneck'''
Bornecks were Near-Humans who inhabited [[Vellity]]. Their skin tones varied from pale yellow to orange-brown. They were patient, sensible pacifists, and farmers who enjoyed hard work and holidays. They lived to an average of one hundred twenty standard years. [[Danetta Pitta]] hid the fact that he had a Borneck ancestor. Many Bornecks migrated to the agriworld of [[Draenell's Point]].

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D+1
DEXTERITY 2D/4D
KNOWLEDGE 1D+1/4D
MECHANICAL 2D/4D+2
PERCEPTION 1D/3D+2
STRENGTH 2D/4D+2
TECHNICAL 1D/3D+2

'''Special Abilities:'''
* None Known
'''Move:''' 8/10
'''Size:''' 1.8-2.0 meters tall
'''Source:''' Wookieepedia (For the Borneck Description)
